root.name: Detana!! TwinBee
root.description: OverviewDetana!! TwinBee translates to "It's Here!! TwinBee," but outside of Japan the game was known as "Bells and Whistles." It was originally released in arcades in 1991, and both TwinBee and WinBee return as stars of this cute 'em up. It also introduces Light and Pastel, although they were not named in this release.
